name: wp-seo-pilot-assets
description: Asset build pipeline for the WP SEO Pilot plugin

scripts.build:less: lessc assets/less/admin.less assets/css/admin.css && lessc assets/less/editor.less assets/css/editor.css && lessc assets/less/internal-linking.less assets/css/internal-linking.css && lessc assets/less/plugin.less assets/css/plugin.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:less
scripts.watch:less: concurrently "less-watch-compiler assets/less assets/css admin.less" "less-watch-compiler assets/less assets/css editor.less" "less-watch-compiler assets/less assets/css internal-linking.less" "less-watch-compiler assets/less assets/css plugin.less"
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch:less

author: WP SEO Pilot
